title: UK police arrest man over discovery of human remains on bridge
content: British police arrested a 24-year-old man in Bristol following the discovery of human remains in two suitcases on the Clifton Suspension Bridge. The suspect, who traveled from London, will be questioned there. The remains were identified as two adult males. A second suitcase was found nearby. Police do not seek additional suspects. Local communities are reassured as inquiries continue.
summary: British police arrested a 24-year-old man in Bristol following the discovery of human remains in two suitcases on the Clifton Suspension Bridge. The suspect, who traveled from London, will be questioned there. The remains were identified as two adult males. A second suitcase was found nearby. Police do not seek additional suspects. Local communities are reassured as inquiries continue.

Amid ongoing war with Hamas, Israel plans to extend compulsory military service for men
content: Israel plans to extend compulsory military service for men from 32 months to 36 months, with a vote scheduled for Sunday. If approved, this extension will last for eight years amid the ongoing war with Hamas and debates over ultra-Orthodox draft legislation. Critics argue this move unfairly burdens current soldiers and allows many Haredi men to avoid military service.
summary: Israel plans to extend compulsory military service for men from 32 months to 36 months, with a vote scheduled for Sunday. If approved, this extension will last for eight years amid the ongoing war with Hamas and debates over ultra-Orthodox draft legislation. Critics argue this move unfairly burdens current soldiers and allows many Haredi men to avoid military service.

title: Russian assassination plots against those supporting Ukraine uncovered in Europe, official says
'Cosmic ballet': Nasa unveils stunning images of two galaxies merging in Space
content: NASA unveiled James Webb Space Telescope’s breathtaking images of two galaxies, known as the Penguin and the Egg, located 326 million light-years away in Hydra. This release celebrates Webb's second anniversary of scientific results, showcasing its ability to explore early universe formation and future cosmic discoveries. The galaxies together are known as Arp 142.
summary: NASA unveiled James Webb Space Telescope’s breathtaking images of two galaxies, known as the Penguin and the Egg, located 326 million light-years away in Hydra. This release celebrates Webb's second anniversary of scientific results, showcasing its ability to explore early universe formation and future cosmic discoveries. The galaxies together are known as Arp 142.

'I promise you I am ok': Biden back on campaign trail amid increasing pressure to quit
content: President Joe Biden embarked on a campaign trip to address concerns among voters and members of his party regarding his leadership capabilities. This follows a significant press conference that did not succeed in silencing demands for him to exit the presidential race. Biden visited Michigan, a critical swing state, and declared, "We've got to finish the job. And I promise you I am OK."
summary: President Joe Biden embarked on a campaign trip to address concerns among voters and members of his party regarding his leadership capabilities. This follows a significant press conference that did not succeed in silencing demands for him to exit the presidential race. Biden visited Michigan, a critical swing state, and declared, "We've got to finish the job. And I promise you I am OK."

title: Elon Musk makes 'sizable' donation to group supporting Trump's 2024 Presidency bid: Report
'Not going anywhere": US President Joe Biden assures supporters in Detroit
'Biden will continue making gaffes like he has been for 40 years'
content: President Joe Biden will probably continue to make gaffes, a Biden campaign official said Friday after his two big slips at the Nato event, a day earlier. He called Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky President Putin and referred to Kamala Harris as Donald Trump amid calls from Democrats for him to opt out of the race. The official said Biden has been making gaffes for the last 40 years, Reuters reported.
summary: President Joe Biden will probably continue to make gaffes, a Biden campaign official said Friday after his two big slips at the Nato event, a day earlier. He called Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky President Putin and referred to Kamala Harris as Donald Trump amid calls from Democrats for him to opt out of the race. The official said Biden has been making gaffes for the last 40 years, Reuters reported.

title: Strange! Princess Anne doesn't remember anything about horse accident
content: Princess Anne has returned to royal duties after being hospitalized last month following an accident caused by a horse but reports said she remembers nothing of that accident. Royal expert Michael Cole concluded that the accident will remain a mystery now.
summary: Princess Anne has returned to royal duties after being hospitalized last month following an accident caused by a horse but reports said she remembers nothing of that accident. Royal expert Michael Cole concluded that the accident will remain a mystery now.

title: Angela Merkel is now a detective -- in German TV show
content: Former German chancellor Angela Merkel is now a small-town detective after her retirement but in a popular German TV show which is making its debut in Italy. Miss Merkel reimagines Angela Merkel as Agatha Christie's Miss Marple -- with all her characteristics including het jacket and hair.
summary: Former German chancellor Angela Merkel is now a small-town detective after her retirement but in a popular German TV show which is making its debut in Italy. Miss Merkel reimagines Angela Merkel as Agatha Christie's Miss Marple -- with all her characteristics including het jacket and hair.

title: Americans have made their minds: Ashley Judd calls on Biden to step aside
content: "With Donald Trump in leadership, speech is chilled. Dissent is punished. Sharing your truth about your life in America can risk your livelihood. When a man raped me in 1998, I was able was have a safe, legal abortion that was accessible right where I live in Tennessee." Ashley Judd wrote.
summary: "With Donald Trump in leadership, speech is chilled. Dissent is punished. Sharing your truth about your life in America can risk your livelihood. When a man raped me in 1998, I was able was have a safe, legal abortion that was accessible right where I live in Tennessee." Ashley Judd wrote.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy says Kamala Harris low IQ same as Biden's cognitive decline
content: Republican politician Vivek Ramaswamy said it's not about Joe Biden or Kamala Harris but the deep state that controls both of them as Kamala Harris' low IQ represents the same thing as Joe Biden's cognitive decline. "It's not a bug, but a 'feature' for the people who control them," Vivek Ramaswamy said.
summary: Republican politician Vivek Ramaswamy said it's not about Joe Biden or Kamala Harris but the deep state that controls both of them as Kamala Harris' low IQ represents the same thing as Joe Biden's cognitive decline. "It's not a bug, but a 'feature' for the people who control them," Vivek Ramaswamy said.

title: No 'crazy f***ing gossip': Instruction to Joe Biden's campaign staff
content: As the morale is drooping in Joe Biden's campaign with many prominent Democrats withdrawing support from Biden, the chair of the campaign Jen O'Malley Dillon has sternly asked the staff to tune our "crazy f***ing gossip land world", according to an audio recording of an all-hand call, reported by Axios.
summary: As the morale is drooping in Joe Biden's campaign with many prominent Democrats withdrawing support from Biden, the chair of the campaign Jen O'Malley Dillon has sternly asked the staff to tune our "crazy f***ing gossip land world", according to an audio recording of an all-hand call, reported by Axios.
